<title level="1" right="Hazard 7" pfs="">[Serpent Ward](/Hazards.aspx?ID=91)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 9

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

Illusionary snakes erupt from the trapped door, inflicting a venomous curse on intruders.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 26 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) or DC 24 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (expert) to deactivate the magical trigger

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Curse the Intruders** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Trigger** The trapped door is opened other than by a [serpentfolk](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=151); **Effect** Hissing, illusionary snakes leap from the door. Each living creature within 30 feet is subjected to the [curse of potent poison](/Curses.aspx?ID=31). If a living creature opened the door, that creature must roll its saving throw against the curse twice and take the worse result (this is a [misfortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=110) effect).
